system.descriptionText: As a Half Action or Reaction, the vehicle's Commander or driver can trigger Smoke Launchers. This Creates a 15 Metre Radius Obscuring Smoke Cloud centered on the vehicle. Single Use Item, must be replaced afterwards.

description.value: As a Half Action or Reaction, the vehicle's Commander or driver can trigger Smoke Launchers. This Creates a 15 Metre Radius Obscuring Smoke Cloud centered on the vehicle. Single Use Item, must be replaced afterwards.
